summary: Quality focused software developer with 4+ proven work experience on Front-End and Hybrid Mobile technologies. Developed from zero the Intrideo mobile app used (at the time) by 1000+ users. Adopted and pushed Hikey's WeMatch full-stack app (web-mobile-backend) to MVP phase, used by 800+ users. Passionate about Javascript eco-system and Front-End subdomain. Currently exploring React-Native and moving towards the native mobile.
